blog.name: masd-1138
blog.title: I just love Star Wars
blog.description: Hi! I'm a big Star Wars fan and I've decided to start a blog about it. My favourite characters are Poe Dameron and Rey, but I pretty much like any character in the SW universe. I will mostly use this page to answer questions about fanfiction that I write on AO3 (my username is MASD_1138). English is not my first language so excuse me in advance if I leave some mistakes. ;)

summary: Wake Up Next to You - MASD_1138 - Star Wars - All Media Types [Archive of Our Own]
title: Wake Up Next to You - MASD_1138 - Star Wars - All Media Types [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Damerey Week Day 3!

Poe’s been in love with Rey since the moment he met her. They’ve become good mission partners, but there’s something that Rey wants to do and she’s afraid to ruin their partnership.

title: Little Red
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2pYNrIS

by Anonymous

For as long as she’s known, something inside her has always been there.

Mostly it’s been asleep.

But now it’s awake.

And she’s afraid.

From circumstances she can’t control, Rey gets a new job, a new home, and a new neighbor—the Big Bad Wolf.

Words: 1894, Chapters: 1/7, Language: English

  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Modern Setting, Alternate Universe - Supernatural Elements, Alternate Universe - Werewolf, Werewolves, Alpha/Beta/Omega Dynamics

by Anonymous

For as long as she’s known, something inside her has always been there.

Mostly it’s been asleep.

But now it’s awake.

And she’s afraid.

From circumstances she can’t control, Rey gets a new job, a new home, and a new neighbor—the Big Bad Wolf.

summary: “I don’t think I’m ready.” (Reylo and/or Finnrose <3)
question: “I don’t think I’m ready.” (Reylo and/or Finnrose <3)
answer:
“I don’t think I’m ready.”

The ramp of the Falcon stands before her; before them both. Rey breathes, reaching out, gently twining her fingers between Ben’s.

“Because… It feels like yesterday I was still waiting,” she explains, “but now…”

Ben squeezes her hand comfortingly, rubbing his thumb against the back of her hand.

“Madam Jedi – there’s a galaxy I want to show you.”

Leave the first sentence of a fic in my ask box and I will write the next five!
